#summary Frequently asked questions.

*Q*: Is there a way to reduce the size of `BulletSharp`.dll?<br>
*A*: Yes. It is possible to remove parts of the library by disabling components you don't need. The appropriate flags can be found in `StdAfx.h`.


*Q*: How do I use `BulletSharp` with double precision?<br>
*A*: Compile Bullet with BT_USE_DOUBLE_PRECISION defined at the top of btScalar.h, then compile `BulletSharp`.


*Q*: When compiling, I get the error "cannot open file 'MSCOREE.lib'", what's wrong?<br>
*A*: Try to add one of these library paths in Visual Studio:

  * C:\Program Files\Microsoft SDKs\Windows\v6.0A\Lib
  * C:\Program Files\Microsoft SDKs\Windows\v7.0A\Lib
  * C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft SDKs\Windows\v6.0A\Lib
  * C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft SDKs\Windows\v7.0A\Lib

see Tools/Options/Projects and Solution/VC++ Directories/Library files.
